abstract.para: The intended readers of this guide are developers who want to develop Collaboration functions of eXo Platform 3.5.
This guide is divided into the following chapters:

listitem.para: Details of 2 applications, including Portlets and Gadgets which are used mainly in Collaboration.
A configuration of Collaboration components, external component plugins and other configurations.
Knowledge of extension points, public REST APIs and JCR structure of the Collaboration applications.
